subject: RE: [junit] testing void method
msgSnippet: Hi, Have a look for MockTests. You can then look if methods are called which should be called in your method returning void.
messageBody:
Hi,

Have a look for MockTests. You can then look if methods are called which should be called in your method returning void.

http://www.jmock.org/getting-started.html

Hope if helps,

-Thijs Metsch

-----Original Message-----
From: junit@yahoogroups.com on behalf of Jignesh
Sent: Sat 8/6/2005 2:06 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] testing void method

Hi,

I have a method which is returning void. How to test it with junit.

-Jignesh
